meanings.definition: To make a sound without using the vocal cords.
meanings.sent1: She whispered, unvoicing her words to avoid waking the baby.
meanings.sent2: The singer practiced unvoicing certain notes to add a unique touch to the song.
meanings.sent3: In the silent library, he mastered the art of unvoicing his sneezes.
meanings.sent4: The wind unvoicing its howl, leaving only a gentle rustle in the trees.
meanings.sent5: The mime expertly demonstrated unvoicing by mimicking the sound of rain without speaking.
